thread.title: Mower Buyer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Mower Buyer

author: Mower Buyer
title: Mower Buyer
text:
Ordered a jacket which arrived within 48 hours, exactly as described, and with order updates throughout the fulfilment process.
Turned out the jacket was too large so I sent back with the prepaid postage and received the new size within another 48 hours. Fantastic service. Very happy with my purchase and will use countryattire in the future!
